title: CMC-Based English Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary and grammar comprehension
context.additional_context: Blended learning environments utilizing personal devices (BYOD), with project-based assessment applications

learning_goals: Learners can conduct at least three topic-based discussions in English using CMC tools (chat, video conferencing, SNS).
Using online collaboration tools, learners provide peer and self-assessment feedback on English writing at least five times.
Learners analyze digital materials (podcasts, videos) to create English presentation materials and deliver them in front of peers.
Learners develop an English learning plan in a CMC environment and achieve an implementation rate of over 80%.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
